channel.title: Kyung-Min Jin
channel.description: Hi, I'm Kyung-Min Jin. See about page (CV)!

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am Kyung-Min Jin, a master’s student in the graduate school of Artificial Intelligence at Korea University (PRML Lab), where I am advised by Prof Seong-Hwan Lee. Before studying at graduate school, I received Bachelor’s degrees (Computer Science and Engineering) and (Artificial Intelligence) at Korea University in 2021.
